question: As salaamualaikum Mufti Sahab, I wanted to know if it is possible to offer Fard salath before the actual time in case of emergency
answer:
QUESTION
Early morning i have to go for Job before the time for Fajr starts, Could you please let me know if it is possible to offer the Salth half an hour before the actual time. Jazakh Allah.
ANSWER


Share:
Fajr salaah commences only upon the break of dawn. It is not permissible to
perform fajr salaah before it's commencing time.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
